ResearchTabDef.label: Vegetable Garden
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: All the Vegetable Garden Project mods research can be found under this tab.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Xtra Flowers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches Xtra Flowers to plant.

ResearchProjectDef.label: agriculture I
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new tier of vegetables to grow. 

 Unlocks sowing of Snow Beats, Beans, Red Lentils, and Olives.

rulesStrings.li: subject->agriculture I
subject_story->joined a short-lived farming community on a rural world
subject_story->experimented with unlocking plant genetics
subject_story->started a large farming operation on a outer rim world
subject_gerund->basic agriculture I

ResearchProjectDef.label: agriculture II
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new fruits to grow. Fruit has a higher nutrition and requires less to make meals. 

 Unlocks sowing of Grapes, Agave, Strawberries, Blueberries, and Watermelons.

rulesStrings.li: subject->agriculture II
subject_story->joined a short-lived farming community on a rural world
subject_story->experimented with unlocking fruit plant genetics
subject_story->started a large fruit farming operation on a outer rim world
subject_gerund->basic agriculture II
subject_gerund->cultivating fruits

ResearchProjectDef.label: agriculture III
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new and exciting new types of plants to grow! Requires Tree Sowing. 

 Unlocks new fruit trees to grow. Fruit trees have a longer grow time but a higher yield. 

 Unlocks sowing of Apples, Bananas, Oranges, and Peaches trees.

rulesStrings.li: subject->fruit tree sowing
subject_story->propagated fruit trees across a long-dead planetoid, trying to bring life back
subject_story->published a paper about maintaining natural ecosystems
subject_story->worked in a fruit tree nursery on an animal world
subject_gerund->sowing fruit trees

ResearchProjectDef.label: ambrosia
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches the ability to grow ambrosia in hydroponic basins.

rulesStrings.li: subject->ambrosia cultivating
subject_story->tried to domesticate wild ambrosia
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating ambrosia easily
subject_story->campaigned for the holistic properties of ambrosia on the body
subject_gerund->cultivating ambrosia

ResearchProjectDef.label: Wild biome plants
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new and exciting types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks new fruits and trees to grow. Fruit trees have a longer grow time but a higher yield. 

 Unlocks sowing of cherry, coconut, fig, date trees. Pineapples, cloudberries, and gooseberries.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cultivating wild biome plants
subject_story->joined a tribal gathering community to learn about world plants
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating wilds plants easily
subject_story->traveled the rim sharing techniques for local fauna farming
subject_gerund->wild plant sowing

ResearchProjectDef.label: Honey Bee Tree
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches engineered bee trees that attract bees to live in and produce honey! Requires Tree Sowing. \n\n Unlocks Bee trees.

rulesStrings.li: subject->honeybee tree sowing
subject_story->propagated trees capable of supporting bee hives
subject_story->published a paper about maintaining natural ecosystems of bee life ecosystems
subject_story->worked on a tree farm on a warm climate introducing bees
subject_gerund->sowing honey bee trees

ResearchProjectDef.label: 3 Sisters Companion Farming
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new types of vegetables that harvests 3 different crops. 

 Unlocks sowing of three sisters crop types.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cultivating companion farming
subject_story->joined a tribal gathering community to learn about wild biome plants
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating plants easily
subject_story->traveled the rim sharing techniques for companion farming
subject_gerund->wild plant sowing

ResearchProjectDef.label: Orchard's Guild Farming
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches plant genetics to unlock new types of plants to grow! 

 Unlocks a new types of vegetables that harvests 3 different crops. 

 Unlocks sowing of three sisters tree crop types.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cultivating wild biome plants
subject_story->joined a tribal gathering community to learn about wild biome plants
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating wilds plants easily
subject_story->traveled the rim sharing techniques for fruit tree farming
subject_gerund->wild plant sowing

ResearchProjectDef.label: 3 Sisters Plant Grafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches plant grafting to unlock new type of plant that harvests into 2 crops! \n\n Unlocks a Pomato plant.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cultivating wild biome plants
subject_story->joined a tribal gathering community to learn about wild biome plants
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating wilds plants easily
subject_story->traveled the rim sharing techniques for local fauna farming
subject_gerund->wild plant sowing

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soylent Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build the Soylent Machine to make Soylent from Plants, Animal Products, Meat and "High Energy Plankton"Â®.

rulesStrings.li: subject->soylent Production
subject->non-perishable processed foods
subject_story->knew, when disaster struck, there were enough packaged meals to survive until rescuers arrived
subject_story->established a social kitchen, which donated soylent meals to all outgoing vessels
subject_story->studied culinary master on meat preparation
subject_gerund->preparing soylent products

ResearchProjectDef.label: Advanced Soylent Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to mass produce Soylent (which reduces production time by arround 15%) and to create simple survivor meals out of soylent and/or pemmican (at high ressource cost).

rulesStrings.li: subject->advanced soylent Production
subject->non-perishable processed foods
subject_story->knew, when disaster struck, there were enough packaged meals to survive until rescuers arrived
subject_story->established a social kitchen, which donated soylent meals to all outgoing vessels
subject_story->studied culinary master on meat preparation
subject_gerund->preparing soylent products

ResearchProjectDef.label: Resource Plants
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches plants the absorb minerals from the ground. That can be extracted in a smelter.

rulesStrings.li: subject->cultivating mineral farming
subject_story->joined a mining community to learn about natural forming minerals and plants that absorb around them
subject_story->established the techniques for cultivating mineral plants easily
subject_story->traveled the rim sharing techniques for mineral extraction
subject_gerund->wild plant sowing

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soil Reclamation I
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches methods of making farmable soil. 

Unlocks placing soil on rough stone. 

Unlocks Floor menu Place Soil and Garden Soil.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Soil Reclamation II
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Researches methods of turning sand, marshy soil, mud, marsh, ice, gravel into farmable soil. 

Unlocks Plow soil, to greatly increase crop growth. 

Unlocks Floor menus to Plow Soil and Reclaim Soil.

ResearchProjectDef.label: adv. hydroponic
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build advanced hydroponics tables to rapidly grow crops indoors regardless of the terrain or weather outside. Tables cost more to make, require power, and provide light. And crops grow at a faster rate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: adv. planter box
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build advanced planter boxes to rapidly grow crops. Boxes cost more to make and crops grow at a faster rate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Heated Sunlamps
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to build advanced sun lamps that provides light and act as a heater to grow crops.

ResearchProjectDef.label: ambrosia
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches the ability to grow ambrosia in hydroponic basins.

rulesStrings.li: subject->ambrosia
subject_story->became obsessed with ambrosia and had to be restrained
subject_story->lectured to the United Planets about medical benefits
subject_story->joined a tribal gathering community to learn about wild biome plants
subject_gerund->producing ambrosia

ResearchProjectDef.label: Glitterworld Medicine
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to craft glitterworld medicine.

rulesStrings.li: subject->medical synthesis
subject->medicine production
subject_story->researched urbworld medicine, aiming to distribute the knowledge more widely
subject_story->was puzzled by the origins of neutroamine and determined to find out more
subject_story->seized the resources of a drug-dealer and produced useful medicines instead
subject_gerund->producing industrial-tech medicine

ResearchProjectDef.label: De-Worm Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce De-Worm, a disease prevention drug.

rulesStrings.li: subject->de-worm production
subject_story->lectured to the United Planets about preventative medicine
subject_story->was driven out of Dawn Falls as a quack, for selling a medicine that "doesn't do anything"
subject_story->prevented an outbreak of gut worms and parasites from spreading through careful penoxycyline dosage
subject_gerund->synthesizing de-worm drugs

ResearchProjectDef.label: Mecha-Gone Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce Mecha-Gone, a disease prevention drug.

rulesStrings.li: subject->mechagone production
subject_story->lectured to the United Planets about preventative medicine
subject_story->was driven out of Dawn Falls as a quack, for selling a medicine that "doesn't do anything"
subject_story->prevented an outbreak of mechanites from spreading through careful drug dosage
subject_gerund->synthesizing mechagone drugs

ResearchProjectDef.label: Candy and Desert Making
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of mixing sugars and milks to make sweet treats. \nUnlocks the Sweets table for makes Milk based treats and candies.

rulesStrings.li: subject->candy
subject->desert making
subject_story->became obsessed with sugar and had to be restrained
subject_story->studied the mixing sugars and ingredients for a thesis
subject_story->set up the best treats shop in the sector
subject_gerund->producing candy
subject_gerund->producing sweet treats
subject_gerund->building desert table

ResearchProjectDef.label: Garden Baking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of baking flours and sugars ingredients in ovens. \nUnlocks the Ovens and Baked Goods.

rulesStrings.li: subject->ovens
subject->baked foods
subject_story->learned of old tribal cooking methods of baking pie over campfires
subject_story->studied the baking cooking method for a thesis
subject_story->set up the bakery shops in the sector
subject_gerund->producing baked goods
subject_gerund->building ovens

ResearchProjectDef.label: Synthread
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of weaving synthread. \nUnlocks the recipe for synthread at the loom.

rulesStrings.li: subject->synthread cloth weaving
subject_story->tailored hard-wearing clothes from plant fibers
subject_story->would relax by sewing and telling stories to the village children
subject_story->learned to craft cloth from blending different plant fibers
subject_gerund->weaving synthread cloth

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hyperweave
ResearchProjectDef.description: Researches methods of weaving hyperweave. \nUnlocks the recipe for hyperweave at the loom.

rulesStrings.li: subject->hyperweave cloth weaving
subject_story->tailored hard-wearing clothes from plant fibers
subject_story->would relax by sewing and telling stories to the village children
subject_story->learned to craft cloth from blending different plant fibers

ResearchProjectDef.label: Terrain Rehabilitation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to correctly layer dirt on rough stone and other terrains to make underground greenhouses.
